QuestData.Title: Core Control
QuestData.Description:
Your timing is most excellent.
It appears one of my traps captured a rather curious creature moments ago. I dare not investigate, but you... you can do this for me.
Take Pocopoc along with you. Perhaps there are secrets yet to be discovered.
QuestData.LogDescription: Examine the curious creature outside of Exile's Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: Pocopoc is most intriguing, yes? I do wonder the extent of its capabilities.
